notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: Name three edges that you could remove from Graph V in Figure 12.225 to form a third spanning tree, different from those in the solution to Example 12.51 Exercise 3.
detailedSolution:
The three edges must include one edge from list A and one pair of edges from list B.
List A: be, eh, hi, gi, bg
List B: ac and ad, ac and af, ac and cd, ac and cf, ad and af, ad and cd, ad and cf, af and cd, af and cf, or cd and cf.
